Transforming Properties with Expert Paving Solutions

For over 26 years, Neff Paving has been the trusted choice for property owners throughout Central Ohio who demand excellence in every project. Winning Top Paving Contractor in the country 2 years now, we can outpace and deliver quality asphalt services at lower costs than our competition. From residential driveways that enhance curb appeal to large-scale commercial installations, we bring unmatched expertise, premium materials, and personalized service to every job.

"Great Company! It has been a great experience from initial contact, to quotation, proposal, scope of work adjustments, communication and work performed. They are a professional company, and they also provided Evidence of Insurance. - Denise (office) is always a pleasure to speak with. - Josh (Estimator) pleasant and very service-oriented. - Mick (and the crew) an absolute pleasure to engage with! After all, the "proof is in the pudding" (or asphalt in this case)!! They did great work, everything is holding up and settling well. I explained to Mick what the scope of work was and what I ultimately was seeking/hoping to see and he was very consultative (even advising, where alternate solutions would be better suited for our project). In the end, he was able to maximize my dollar of the allotted spend for this project. He went further and was consultative on how we could plan for future projects. I have already reached out to Neff Paving to request updated quotes to complete the rest of our driveway. Folks, in today's world, where every dollar is crucial; it is gratifying to find an honest, professional company that performs great work and values the Customer relationship. Give them a call to see how they can help you out with your next project.

Why Choose Neff Paving?

26+ years of experience delivering exceptional paving solutions across Central Ohio

Quality Guaranteed

We use only premium materials and proven techniques to ensure your paving project stands the test of time. Every job comes with our comprehensive warranty.

  • Premium asphalt and concrete materials
  • Advanced equipment and technology
  • Comprehensive project warranty
  • Follow-up maintenance services

Licensed & Insured

Fully licensed contractor with comprehensive insurance coverage, giving you peace of mind throughout your project from start to finish.

  • State Licensed Contractor #PA-123456
  • $2M General Liability Insurance
  • Workers Compensation Coverage
  • Surety Bonding up to $5M

Fast Response

We understand that paving issues can't wait. Our team provides rapid response for estimates and emergency services to minimize disruption.

  • 24/7 emergency hotline
  • Same-day estimates available
  • Flexible scheduling options
  • Weather contingency planning

Flexible Scheduling

We work around your schedule and weather conditions to complete projects efficiently while maintaining the highest quality standards.

  • Weekend and evening availability
  • Minimal business disruption
  • Seasonal project planning
  • Coordinated timeline management

Family-Owned Values

As a second-generation family business, we bring personal attention and genuine care to every project, treating your property like our own.

  • Personal project management
  • Long-term customer relationships
  • Community-focused service
  • Transparent communication

Modern Technology

We invest in the latest paving equipment and technology to deliver superior results efficiently while minimizing environmental impact.

  • GPS-guided grading systems
  • Advanced compaction equipment
  • Eco-friendly material processing
  • Digital project documentation
